page.title: 16Shiskine Valley Sports Day
page.content:
The Shiskine Valley Sports Day was held on{Saturday 6th July 1985,}for the first time in thirty years.
The weather was bright and sunny. It was opened by Mrs Helen Mac Alister at two o'clock in the afternoon. The first event was the Round Shiskine Road Race. There were also many other events, such as, flat races, women and mens five a_side football matches, pillow fights, tug_of_war, tossing the caber and throwing the 56lb weight.
The Kinloch Hotel provided the beer tent. Other groups, such as cubs, playgroups, local shops and the Arran Outdoor Centre ran stalls, such as lucky dip, hamburgers, ice cream, white elephant, plant & home baking.
